user.title: LocalAI Setup
user.description: Enter the URL of your LocalAI instance.

data.model: Model to use for the conversation agent.
data.system_prompt: The system prompt to send to the AI. This is the base personality.
data.tool_prompt: Extra instructions for the AI on how to use the tools.
data.base_instructions: Base instructions for controlling Home Assistant.
data.area_aware_prompt: Prompt when the device's area is known. Use placeholders for the area and floor.
data.no_area_prompt: Prompt when the device's area is not known.
data.timer_unsupported_prompt: Prompt when the device does not support timers.
data.dynamic_context_prompt: Prompt explaining how to use the GetLiveContext tool for real-time data.
data.top_p: Top P for the AI model.
data.max_tokens: Max tokens to generate in the response.
data.max_function_calls_per_conversation: Maximum number of function calls per conversation turn.
data.debug_logging: Enable to log the full request and response to the AI.
